item.title: My Raspberry Pi 3 setup
item.description: I recently bought a Raspberry Pi 3 mainly for media playback purposes. Here is the setup process to remember later. My distro of choice is Arch Linux ARM. Arch Linux has a really nice set of documentation, I recommend these two to get started: https://archlinuxarm.org/platforms/armv8/broadcom/raspberry-pi-3 https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Raspberry_Pi UART setup I like to set up these small computers without keyboards or a monitor. One way to do this is to use ssh and connect to the device and the other is to use the serial console.
